Articles.Content:
Are there any good skyboxes? I mean looks nice in the game with high resolution? A milky way skybox would be best. I've tried Reardon's 8K skybox but it looks terrible in game (i posted a pic in that thread). Thanks,

Benji13.
Search for poodmund's skyboxes. I personally use his deep star box, he also has a Milky Way one.

Thanks for the endorsement, Theysen. Benji13, you can preview the ones I have listed here:

Alternatively, if you don't fancy any of them, the TextureReplacer OP has a list of various skyboxes for you to download and use.  

EDIT: Also do not forget the gorgeous one that DasValdez uses on his Twitch channel which is a blend of Astronomer's Interstellar nebula skybox layered ontop of Raredens real 8k skybox put together by respawntwo: http://goo.gl/R9mIVs

Edited November 5, 2016 by Poodmund
